title: Intro to toRvik
text: toRvik package scrapers pull data Barttorvik, popular college basketball analytics website, return tidy format. Barttorvik splits data number variables hosts detailed player game statistics, serving reputable, industry-recognized metric rating system. Generally speaking, data avaliable back 2007-08 season. information Barttorvik, data, metric rating system can found . Package functions syntactically structured point data source (e.g. ‘player,’ ‘game,’ etc.) considered get functions nature. toRvik version 1.0.1, package exports 20 functions covering website data. highlights include: Retrieving detailed game--game player statistics Splitting advanced metrics game location, type, date range, opponent strength Pulling play--play shooting bins players teams Grabbing composite recruit rankings top players coach Generating injury-adjusted efficiency measures team

title: Intro to toRvik
text: Lastly introductory vignette, explore toRvik functions scraping tournament data. Frequent time social media college basketball circles March, undoubtedly hear ‘team sheets,’ detailed repositories strength quality metrics used seeding selection committee. bart_tourney_sheets, can pull ‘quick-hit’ team sheets tidy format just single line code: Returned sheets top teams sorted NCAA NET ranking. function relies NET data, available back 2018-19 season. -season performance valuable, want investigate just tournament data? Well, toRvik gives two options : bart_tourney_odds bart_tourney_results. former returns metric-adjusted round probabilities split. Let’s explore round odds 2022 NCAA Tournament: ‘odds’ argument set ‘pre,’ returned pre-tournament odds sorted likelihood reach second weekend (Sweet 16). bart_tourney_odds also takes current odds (‘current’), odds based recent performance (‘recent’), odds based games strong opponents (‘t100’). data similarly available starting 2019 tournament. Now, want explore tournament results? bart_tourney_results, can return raw adjusted outcomes split. , returned aggregate conference results 2011 2021, sorted PAKE – number wins attained KenPom expectation. function splits team (‘team’), conference (‘conf’), coach (‘coach’), seed (‘seed’) includes data starting 2000.

title: Get Conference Four Factor Statistics — bart_conf_factors
text: year Defaults current season (YYYY). venue Filters venue; defaults ``. type Filters game type; defaults ``. quad Filters quadrant level; defaults `4`. top Filters opponent T-Rank position; defaults NULL (). start Filters start date; defaults NULL (full season). end Filters end date; defaults NULL (full season).

title: Get Conference Four Factor Statistics — bart_conf_factors
text: brief explanation factor computation, please visit KenPom's blog. Data can split five variables: venue Splits game location; '', 'home', 'away', 'neutral', 'road' (away + neutral). type Splits game type; '', 'nc' (non-conference), 'conf' (conference), 'reg' (regular season), 'post' (post-season tournaments), 'ncaa' (NCAA tournament). quad Splits quadrant level; 1-4 0 indicating 1-games. top Splits opponent T-Rank position, adjusted game location. start/end Splits date range (YYYYMMDD).
